page.title: 07LEISURE IN WITHYHAM/ST.JOHN
page.content: The two main things done for{leisure are{walking}and{horse riding.}One walk which a lot of people do is what we call the Pooh walk. It is popular because you can take a car some of the way and then walk on to the well known Pooh bridge. Most people go in the morning and take a picnic lunch and play at Pooh sticks. Pooh sticks is a game which A.A.Milne made up when he took his son and teddy bear called Pooh to the bridge. They would play Pooh sticks by standing on one side of the bridge and throwing a stick in they would see which stick got to the other side first. There is also a considerable amount of pony riding in the forest. You could ride a horse from School Lane to the Five Acre Wood without riding on a main road.
